leftSection.title: Reserve Your Spot Today
highlights: Limited Seats Available – Secure your place in this transformative experience.
Pricing: Starting at INR 5,100/- (including all meals, accommodation, and sessions).
leftSection.callToAction: Take the First Step Towards a Balanced Life
leftSection.description: Don’t let stress define your life. Join us in this summer retreat this May and June, and take the first step towards a more balanced, peaceful, and fulfilling life.
